text:
@GOP Cock womble Trump 
-Lies about historic facts
-Lies about the dangers of fracking
-Has had peaceful protesters shot, gassed, and beaten for a photo op
-And failed to explain why he took so long to take the COVID-19 pandemic seriously resulting in the deaths of thousands.
